import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Login.css' function Login() { const initialStateErrors = { email:{required : false}, password:{require: false}, coustomError:null } const [errors , seterrors] = useState({...initialStateErrors}); return (

{errors.password.required? ( Password is required. ): null }

):null}

) } export default Login;
